suite.name: Test Api Usuarios

test.name: Scenario: Register on the Test site

kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=serverest, url=https://serverest.dev, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=True, debug=0

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.
kw.msg: ${headers} = {'Accept': 'application/json', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'}

kw.name: POST On Session
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: ${response} = <Response [201]>

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.
kw.msg: ${message} = Cadastro realizado com sucesso

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Should Be Equal
kw.doc: Fails if the given objects are unequal.

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.
kw.msg: ${generated_id} = YCvG6Z9I0SMupySw

kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server

kw.name: GET On Session
kw.doc: Sends a GET request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: GET Request : url=https://serverest.dev/usuarios/YCvG6Z9I0SMupySw path_url=/usuarios/YCvG6Z9I0SMupySw headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.31.0', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive'} body=None
${response} = <Response [200]>

kw.msg: ${user_data} = {'nome': 'David Sanchez', 'email': 'justsanchez@qa1.com.br', 'password': 'teste-login', 'administrador': 'true', '_id': 'YCvG6Z9I0SMupySw'}
